name: Sengoku Hime 4: Souha Hyakkei, Hana Mamoru Chikai
name_original: Sengoku Hime 4: Souha Hyakkei, Hana Mamoru Chikai
description:
Sengoku Hime 4: Souha Hyakkei, Hana Mamoru Chikai is an adventure game developed by SystemSoft Alpha and Unicorn-A. It came out on 14-12-2012. SystemSoft Alpha published the game.
You can play Sengoku Hime 4: Souha Hyakkei, Hana Mamoru Chikai on PS Vita, PSP, PlayStation 3 and PC.
